amendment.description: To require congressional review of certain agency rulemaking.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1121, under the order of 10/24/23, having not achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 283.

action.text: Amendment SA 1121 proposed by Senator Paul for Senator Lee to Amendment SA 1092. (consideration: CR S5282) To require congressional review of certain agency rulemaking.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1121, under the order of 10/24/23, having not achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 283.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1121, under the order of 10/24/23, having not achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 283.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1121 proposed by Senator Paul for Senator Lee to Amendment SA 1092.
